name: Sevens: The Never Not Funny Game
name_original: Sevens: The Never Not Funny Game
description:
Ready to play the game made famous by Jimmy Pardo and Matt Belknap on the Award Winning Podcast Never Not Funny?

"Sevens" is the fast paced party game that will have you shouting, singing, and acting out as you try and get your teammates to guess the clue on the card! But do it fast, you only have 7 seconds for each clue!

Download the Primo Access today and start playing with 30 different categories!!

Categories include 80's Music, Action Movies, Celebrities, Broadway, Never Not Funny Trivia, Sports, Comedians, Super Heroes, Baseball, and over 20 more!!

More packs are coming soon!
